poem:
Title: "Shadow Chase Along Desert'Steps"

In Furiosa's cry, echoes of childhood lost,
Her mother's specter haunts the dust swirl,
In the heat-haze of vengeful tempest tossed,
Anya paints the sand canvas in hectic twirl.
A chase resumed, colossal in tragic scope,
Where vehicular phantoms roar and cope,
Melting dream and reality in oiled, riveted rhapsody,
A ballet of violence, in Miller's epic, free.
